snippet.title: Civilization Online - CBT1 Promotion Video
snippet.description:
Civilization Online is a unique new MMORPG in which players work together to build a civilization from the stone age to the space age. Create your custom avatar and then choose which role you will play in the expansion of your empire. Research and develop new technologies, construct buildings and great wonders, wage war, or conduct espionage to achieve victory over other players and civilizations in a dynamically changing world.

Find us on Facebook: http://facebook.com/2kgames.asia
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/2KGamesAsia
